title: Ein besonderer Ausflug
translation: The couple Anna and Jens sometimes feel lonely. One day, they read about an innovation in the newspaper: a cheese factory offers tours with herbal tea. The couple decides to work along and visit the cheese factory. There, they meet the boss, who shows them everything. With headphones, they listen to an exciting review of the cheese factory’s history. During the tour, they drink herbal tea and taste cheese. In the garden, they meet a hiker who tells them briefly how he often goes back to the cheese factory. In the evening, Anna and Jens review the day and say: That was a great day full of innovations. Now they no longer feel lonely.
